grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 斜面【シャメン】slope, slanting surface, bevel
急傾斜【キュウケイシャ】steep slope (incline)
kun reading compounds: 斜め【ななめ】slanting, tilted, sloping, diagonal, oblique, distorted (feeling), slanted (e.g. view of the world), bad (mood), amiss, awry
斜め応力【ななめおうりょく】oblique stress
斜交い【はすかい】aslant, oblique, diagonal, askew, cater-cornered, catty-cornered
